com.github.rolecraftdev.data.storage

Class DataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rolecraftdev.data.storage.DataStore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQLDataStore, SQLiteDataStore

    public abstract class DataStore
extends Object
    Represents a form of data storage in Rolecraft - implemented in MySQL and SQLite
